turn.2: 2014–15 Central Arkansas Bears basketball team The 2014–15 Central Arkansas Bears basketball team represented the University of Central Arkansas during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I men's basketball season.
turn.4: The Bears were led by head coach Russ Pennell and played their home games at the Farris Center.
turn.6: They were members of the Southland Conference.
turn.8: The Bears were picked to finish 12th in the Southland Conference Coaches' Poll and 11th in the Sports Information Director's Poll.

turn.10: They finished the season 2–27, 2–16 in conference, to finish in 13th and last place.
